forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
